meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful lithograph of a sunset at the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of lithographs by famous artists.
meanings.sent3: The lithograph of a cat wearing sunglasses made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like lithographs etched in my memory.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the lithograph popped off the paper, creating a stunning image.

meanings.sent1: The artist lithographs the design onto the stone carefully.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to lithograph her drawings in art class.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally lithographed my handprint on the table.
meanings.sent4: His words lithograph a vivid picture of the scene in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The printer lithographs the image onto the paper with precision.
